author: henning
msg: We require maven now to build our tree. Remove the old and aged ant
build files (they probably don't run any longer).

author: henning
msg: This is now in the gump repository itself. No need to drag it around with us.

author: henning
msg: Move to the RC1 of commons-fileupload. This should be available on
ibiblio shortly. If your compilation breaks, get it directly from
jakarta.apache.org/commons/fileupload/ and put it into your local repo.

author: henning
msg: There is more to tests that AssertTrue.
Silence the log4j log messages. Only FATAL is really interesting.

author: henning
msg: Let's use AssertFalse(..., ..., something) for this. :-)
